title: 17 - Episode SE7ENteen
description: This week's favorite murders include the killing of 13 year old Jennifer Moore in Novato, CA, and the murder-suicide of pro-wrestler Chris Benoit and his family. Plus tons of personal stories, shit talking, staying sexy, and not getting murdered.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
